string-array.name: Venkatesan
string-array.item: In 2010, his historical novel Kaaval Kottam received the Fiction Award from The Tamil Literary Garden, Canada. \nThe next year, it got him the prestigious Sahitya Academy Award on the following year.
He is a very good orator as well as a good writer.

string-array.name: Sathyan
string-array.item: Son of former Mayor Rajan Chellapa

string-array.name: Annadurai
string-array.item: Joint secretary of Madurai city studentsâ€™ wing \n Madurai district Amma Peravai secretary.

string-array.name: Kumar
string-array.item: Son of deputy Chief Minister and AIADMK chief O Panneerselvam

string-array.name: Elangovan
string-array.item: He was a member of the lok sabha of India.
He was appointed as President of Tamil Nadu Congress Committee by All India Congress Committee Chief Sonia Gandhi on 31 October 2014, followed by the resignation of B. S. Gnanadesikan.

string-array.name: Selvan
string-array.item: He was a member of Parliament of India representing Tamil Nadu in the Rajya Sabha
He also participated in same Antipatti constituency and win two elections in same constituency in 2011-2016, 2016-present

string-array.name: Natarajan
string-array.item: He is a member of the 15th Lok Sabha of India.
He represents the Coimbatore constituency of Tamil Nadu.\n He is a member of the CPI(M) party.

string-array.name: Radhakrishnan
string-array.item: He was a two-time member of the Lok Sabha.
In 2012, he courted arrest in Mettupalayam for protesting against action not being taken against culprits who assaulted a Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh activist.

string-array.name: Appadurai
string-array.item: He served as the Member of Rajya Sabha and Lok Sabha.
Member of Tamil Nadu Legislative Assembly.
